name: Poly Wars (Little Game Studio)
description:
This game is a simple multiplayer third person shooter with 3 game modes : Battle Royale, Deathmatch and Elimination. It also contains 5 character skins and 5 types of weapons : 1 pistol, 2 rifles, 1 LMG, 1 shotgun and 1 sniper.

Update 1.5 : Grenades are now working : smoke, flash & frag.

Update 1.6 : Now an fps !

Please download the lastest version of the game (for bug preventing).

Controls : WASD or ZQSD depending on your keyboard for the movement

1, 2, 3, 4, 5 to cycle weapons, G or 5 for grenades

X for jetpack & F to open lootboxes and pickup things.
